title: S-Ride Offers 8, 9, and 10-Speed 1 and 2x Shimano-Compatible Mechanical Road Levers
content:
Looking for Shimano-compatible 8 through 10-speed mechanical road levers in 1 and 2x varieties? Check out the S-Ride offerings ranging from $99.99 to $129.99. These short-pull brake/shifter levers use a simple shifting intuition: Use the brake lever for downshifts and the release lever for upshifts. The levers are Shimano road compatible only with the 10-speed compatibility 4700, RX400, the 9-speed R3000, 3500, and 8-speed with all 8-speed Shimano and even some 9-speed setups.

Soma is the carrier for S-Ride, and right now, they have them all in stock.

The post S-Ride Offers 8, 9, and 10-Speed 1 and 2x Shimano-Compatible Mechanical Road Levers appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
